overview: In 1959, a group of Russian hikers mysteriously died while traversing the snowy mountains of Siberia. Their deaths remain unexplained to this day. In this video LEMMiNO examines the available criminal case files, autopsy reports, and photos taken by the hikers themselves in an effort to unravel this mystery.
tagline: Yet, this adventure would prove to be their last.
title: The Dyatlov Pass Case
